title: The Image of Camuliana
post: There is a pretty cool movie about Hypatia on Netflix (streaming available) called “Agora.”  Worth a look. Make popcorn, invite friends.
author: Josie L. Tyner

title: The Image of Camuliana
post: I’ve never heard of the legend of the Camuliana icon.  Perhaps this confuses several legends?  Anyone have any information on this and its relation to others?
author: Andy Weiss
